front.title: RTP payload format for G.718 speech/audio

abstract.t: This document specifies the Real-Time Transport Protocol (RTP) payload format for the Embedded Variable Bit-Rate (EV-VBR) speech/audio codec, specified in ITU-T G.718. A media type registration for this RTP payload format is also included. Conventions used in this document The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119 [RFC2119].
